result.reason: This is a broad feature request without concrete requirements or current-version validation, and the latest triage comment explicitly asks for retest and reproducible details.
result.approach: Request retest on v1.79.x/dev and collect exact KiTTY support scope (launch integration, arguments, session handling, and expected UI behavior) before implementation.
